title: Game Crashed
body: After severals attempts to connect to the games after champions select the game crashed every time today. The great thing now is that I got this message "Due to recent leaving and AFK behaviors on this account, you will be placed in a lower priority queu" Can someone help me fix this!!!!!!

replies.body:
When you say that the game crashed, what do you mean exactly?  Do you get a particular error message at all?  Or does the Loading Screen Never appear and when you go back to the client there is just a message there that says "The game has crashed"?  With a little bit further info, I should be able to help out!

Reply back and let me know!

Thank you for taking the time replying my comment.
well after the champion selection is done and the count down finished the screen goes black to start the loading usually after a few sec it comes back with champions lined up and loading starts but today every time i tried to get into a game screen gets black and after that i get this error that the game has crashed. i tried almost everything restart my mac, uninstalled and then re installed the game, reset NVRAM,..... but in my few last tries when i start looking for a game and after an active game is found i click join, then i get this error "no active game was found" or something similar.

Thanks!

ps. I was demoted since I couldn't join those games and now every time that i try I have to wait 10 min to see if the problem is solved or not.

From your more specific description, it sounds like there may be some sort of weird hardware interaction that is not allowing League to launch or appear correctly.  To hopefully get this resolved, make sure that you complete all of the steps in our [Game Crash Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#section-mac).  There are quite a few steps there, but they are crucial in hopefully resolving this issue.

Let me know if it doesn't seem to help!

Well I have done all these steps before posting my first comment here not to mention that I had no problem for a long time until 2 days ago. An update on my situation is that I was able to join the game in my few last tries but the problem is that i am still getting that black screen and message every single time but now when force to quit that black screen (loading screen) and try to reconnect or close the game and reopen a new client and then reconnect after like 10-15 min doing all these I did join the game. the thing is that I have to keep doing all these ( restarting the pc, forcing the quit and reconnecting to the game, closing and reopening the client and reconnecting to the game,...) like 20-30 times with a chance of reconnecting to the game once. 

Thanks.

ps; since with all these problems, I am losing at least half of each game, I was demoted for the third time and now when I want to see if the problem is solved or not I have to wait 20 minutes every time. It would be appreciated if you could help me with the wait time on the lower priority.

Since nothing seems seems to help so far, we are going to need to start digging a little deeper into what could be causing this issue and start pouring over individual logs.  So that this point, make sure to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) over to us!  One of our Tech Specialists will be able to work with you one-on-one in order to get this resolved.  Make sure to include the following as well:

* [r3d log](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674#mq6)
* [System Report](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674#mq4)
* [Process List](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674#mq3)

Well as of this morning I tried twice and everything was perfectly fine without any problems and the important thing is I didn't touch anything since my last comment yesterday, but I got disciplinary  discharged because of this problems until Jul 06, 2016.
I want to thank you for your help and effort to solve this problem, since I wont be able to log in to my account for 2 weeks I think it is not necessary to waste more of you time, I am sure that my problems are not important anymore.

Regards!
BobiLord
